Package

allegro

Initializers

📄

Methods

🏁

Class 🎶

🎶 represents an audio sample.

Initializers

📄

🍬 🐈 📄 path 🔡

Loads the sample from the file at the given path. Depending on what libraries are available, the full set of recognised extensions is: .wav, .flac, .ogg, .it, .mod, .s3m, .xm.

Methods

🏁

🐖 🏁 volume 🚀 pan 🚀 speed 🚀 ➡️ ✨

Starts playing the sample.
